nodes.text: Raysol Prime was an astronomical object known for its luxury resorts. While the smuggler Lando Calrissian was investigating a chamber in the Mesulan Remnants Belt with his droid co-pilot L3-37 at some point by 10 BBY, the former stated that if they survived, he wished to take a month of rest and relaxation alone at a luxury resort on Raysol Prime.
Raysol Prime was mentioned in the 2018 novel Last Shot, written by Daniel José Older.
